title: Corbid! A Colorful Adventure
description:
Dive into this exciting and colorful adventure! Help Corbid overcome the challenging mazes and secure his place as champion. Get ready to have fun as you embark on this colorful and exciting mission, where you’ll have to use your dexterity and skills to solve the intricate puzzles in the huge gardens.
The gardens are full of fun riddles and puzzles in which you will have to do your best to advance. Use all your resources, feel the speed and the frenzy of the jumps to get as far as you can. Also, let yourself be advised by different allies and even help some of them to unlock new areas.
Find adventure companions on your journey to help you complete fun scenarios and become more effective against dangers. Combine skills to achieve unique moves and solve more complex puzzles. Above all, make friends

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950
